data.enText: a member of a religious community of women who promise to serve God all their lives and often live together in a convent

tr: the 14th letter of the Hebrew alphabet

value.def: A nun is a member of a female religious community.

example.ex: Mr Thomas was taught by the Catholic nuns whose school he attended.
example.tran: 托马斯先生是在天主教修女创办的学校接受的教育。
